thread.title: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho reveals sales of Morgan Schneiderlin and Memphis Depay open up first team chance for academy star Axel Tuanzebe
thread.title_full: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho reveals sales of Morgan Schneiderlin and Memphis Depay open up first team chance for academy star Axel Tuanzebe

author: arichardson
title: Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho reveals sales of Morgan Schneiderlin and Memphis Depay open up first team chance for academy star Axel Tuanzebe
text:
EFL One tuan Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho reveals sales of Morgan Schneiderlin and Memphis Depay open up first team chance for academy star Axel Tuanzebe 
Special One ready to give 19-year-old defender opportunity in senior side after loss of two members of squad in January By ANDREW RICHARSON
